message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you and worth the price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your product and would like to make a counteroffer of $95.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value this product at a higher price point. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $102.50?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $100 for your product.
